mapper.insert: insert into system_grant ( q_key, q_type, q_platform, q_exclude_platform, q_items, q_time_interval, q_expired, q_rolecreated, q_caption, q_level, q_other ) values ( #{ q_key,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{ q_type,jdbcType=INTEGER }, #{ q_platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{ q_exclude_platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{ q_items,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR }, #{ q_time_interval,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{ q_expired,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{ q_rolecreated,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{ q_caption,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{ q_level,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{ q_other,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR } )
mapper.update: update system_grant set q_key = #{ q_key,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, q_type = #{ q_type,jdbcType=INTEGER }, q_platform = #{ q_platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, q_exclude_platform = #{ q_exclude_platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, q_items = #{ q_items,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR }, q_time_interval = #{ q_time_interval,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, q_expired = #{ q_expired,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, q_rolecreated = #{ q_rolecreated,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, q_caption = #{ q_caption,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, q_level = #{ q_level,jdbcType=VARCHAR }, q_other = #{ q_other,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR } where q_id = #{ q_id,jdbcType=INTEGER }
mapper.delete: delete from system_grant where q_id = #{ q_id,jdbcType=INTEGER }
